description: This file provides a set of functions to interact with a backend database for managing project boards, columns, and tasks. It includes functions for fetching initial board data, moving, creating, updating, and deleting tasks, as well as computing column progress.

methods.name: getInitialBoard(client, projectId)
methods.description: Fetches columns and tasks for a given project; if none exist, creates default columns.

methods.name: moveTask(client, taskId, toColumnId, toPosition)
methods.description: Updates a task's column_id and position to reflect drag/drop reordering.

methods.name: createTask(client, projectId, columnId, payload)
methods.description: Creates a new task in a specified column with the next available position.

methods.name: updateTask(client, id, payload)
methods.description: Updates fields of a task identified by its ID.

methods.name: deleteTask(client, id)
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID.

methods.name: computeColumnProgress(column, tasks)
methods.description: Calculates and returns the completion percentage for a column based on tasks marked as done.

ctags.name: createTask
ctags.pattern: /^export async function createTask(client, projectId, columnId, payload) {$/

ctags.name: moveTask
ctags.pattern: /^export async function moveTask(client, taskId, toColumnId, toPosition) {$/
